description: Luna grew up with her father on Mars. When her father died, she studied hard and won a scholarship from the Howard Foundation. She moved to Colony Loca A2 along with her pet robot cat Chako. She is a born leader and always seems to bring out the good in everyone. She seems to always be happy, although the thought of her father`s death still holds deep in her heart. She doesn`t like to see anyone hurt, and will go out of her way to save someone. Although her plans all have good intentions, sometimes they don`t turn out the way she wants them to. Luna has powers that nobody else has and her powers can be considered as telepathy. Luna can speak to Adam by telepathy.
name: Luna
